Room.Name: Alturis Road/Pearl Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Pearl Avenue and Alturis Road.
Room.LongDescription: The Cathedral of Veratus stands proudly to the northwest. The entrance to the Cathedral is to the west. Pearl Avenue runs through the center of the city heading past the great Towers. To the south, you can see a number of archers practicing on a large field. Better not get too close, or you might be catching arrows.
